title: When you want the best of Kyle -- luxury, location, life-style!
posting_body: This one may be the perfect fit for you.
From the state-of-the-art Fitness Center to the luxurious granite countertops, these apartment homes are definitely a cut above.
Three sizes of 1-bedroom apartments are available.
Call or text me for all the details or to make an appointment to tour:
I provide Texas-licensed free service to you, with details on all the best deals on apartments in the San Marcos/Kyle/New Braunfels area.
Let me know your preferred location and price range, and I can quickly show you exactly what's available at the best pricing.
This one is very convenient to dining, shopping, entertainment, and major roadways --
24 Hour State Of The Art Fitness Center
Yoga Studio with On Demand Training
Stunning Heated Pool with Tanning Deck
Climate Controlled Pet Spa with Grooming Table and Towel Service
Car Care Package with On Site Vacuum and Wash Vouchers
Plum Creek Golf Course Direct Access
Complimentary Round of Golf and Exclusive Course Discounts
Poolside Pavilion with WiFi, TV's and Fireplace
Adjustable Louvered Cabanas with USB Outlets
Linear Fire Pits with Cozy Seating
Tech Lounge with WiFi and Bluetooth Printing
Expansive Community Lounge with Ping Pong Table
Garages, Carports and Storage Units Available
USB Outlets in Kitchen and Bedrooms
Open Concept Kitchen with Shiplap Island or Peninsula
Soaking Tubs with Subway Tile Surrounds
